name: Single-arm Preacher Curl
how_to_perform:
1. Sit at a preacher curl bench with your back resting against the pad and your arm hanging down, elbow slightly bent.
 Hold dumbbell in your hand, with palm facing in.

2. Slowly extend your arm straight up, keeping your upper arm still, lower back tight and core engaged.
3. Lower the dumbbell back to the starting position without swinging or jerking, maintaining control throughout the movement.
4. Repeat for desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: Single-arm preacher curls are an isolation exercise that targets one bicep at a time.
